useCaseSection.title: Learn based on our business use cases
useCaseSection.description: We are a team of AI geeks, software engineers and entrepreneurs who are passionate about creating innovative solutions. We stay up-to-date with the latest technologies and tools and continuously test new products. We combine our technical expertise with our industry insights to create and publish solutions on DigitizerSpace that are both cutting-edge and simple to use.
useCaseSection.automationDescription: Connect various apps with each other via APIs and safe tons of time
useCaseSection.workflowDescription: Create systematic approaches to your daily tasks and easy to follow routines for your employees
useCaseSection.digitizationDescription: Eliminate pen and paper and make every information accessible to your team
useCaseSection.aiDescription: Use artificial intelligence to generate the content you need like images and videos

benefitSection.title: Benefit from the wave of new technology
benefitSection.subtitle: and implement it in your business the right way
benefitSection.description: Today's software landscape enables you to do much more than just integrating chatbots but it can be overwhelming to know what works best for your business. DigitizerSpace is here to help you identify use cases.
benefitSection.firstText: Stay up to date with trends and tools.
benefitSection.secondText: Identify use cases for your business.
benefitSection.thirdText: Implement solutions that will boost your business.

aboutSection.title: We seamlessly build and launch automation solutions
aboutSection.subtitle: In case you need an automation hand take a look at our tailored services
aboutSection.firstText: Pre-built automation solutions that can be customized to fit your business needs.
aboutSection.secondText: Software products and tools that can help you automate your business processes.
aboutSection.thirdText: Consulting service designed to help you identify areas where automation and digitization can improve your processes.

clientSection.title: Hear from our clients
clientSection.description: How our clients have transformed their business with us, streamlined processes, improved efficiency, saved costs and increased revenue.

newsletterSection.title: Be the first to receive our industry specific trends
newsletterSection.description: Our goal is to help you leverage the latest automation technologies and artificial intelligence to run your business with a tailwind.
newsletterSection.firstText: Never miss out on news, trends and special offers.
newsletterSection.secondText: Receive our latest insights and updates.

about.title: We build solutions for everyday business activities
about.description: We are a group of tech-savvy individuals who run our own businesses in various industries. We are passionate about solving everyday problems with innovative solutions and automating as much as possible. By freeing up our time, we can focus on what we are most passionate about.
about.firstSectionText: We quickly realized that many business owners are so busy with day-to-day activities that they don't have time to keep up with the latest technologies, let alone integrate them into their operations. We are passionate about the rapid development of software, especially when it comes to artificial intelligence.
about.secondSectionText: That's why we decided to make our research public and create
about.thirdSectionText: Our goal is to simplify the process of integrating new technologies into your business and offer you our knowledge and experience. We've developed industry-specific tools that help you automate, digitalize and streamline your workflows.
about.fourthSectionText: Tobias Wupperfeld is the founder of DigitizerSpace. He is a seasoned software engineer with experience in various industries, including working at international corporations like SAP and innovative AI startups. Tobias has a passion for innovation and is dedicated to helping businesses of all sizes leverage the latest automation technologies and artificial intelligence to save time, cost and increase efficiency.
about.quote: I personally think that AI won't replace businesses but businesses that use AI will replace businesses that don't. Businesses powered by AI don't just lead, they dominate. Positioning oneself now before everyone else does is the key to success. Working smarter, not harder, is the essence of digital transformation.
about.fortune500LinkText: 80% of Fortune 500 companies use OpenAI products?
about.sixthSectionText: These companies have long understood the potential of AI and have been using it to their advantage. With the increasing demand for AI, it's only a matter of time until smaller businesses start adopting it too.
about.seventhSectionText: By partnering with DigitizerSpace, you can take advantage of the latest automation technologies and stay ahead of the competition. Check out our
about.eighthSectionText: to learn more about how we can help you achieve your business objectives.

contact.title: Nehmen Sie Kontakt mit uns auf
contact.description: Got a project in mind? Let's talk, we'd love to hear from you. Choose a contact option below or simply fill in the form and one of the team will be in touch!
contact.formDescription: How can DigitizerSpace help you? One of the team will be in touch after you submit this form.

paperless.title: Transform your physical documents into a searchable online archive
paperless.description: Paperless is an open-source community-developed document management software that runs on the server. You can connect your scanner to it or just drop files from your devices into the consumption of Paperless. The software automatically sorts and names your documents and makes them fully searchable thanks to OCR.
paperless.firstCheckedText: Find the right documents at a blazing speed and simplify collaborating with your team by digitalizing all your documents with Paperless.
paperless.secondCheckedText: Never worry about your files. Everything is backed up on your server.
paperless.thirdCheckedText: Forget about the repetitive task of manually naming and sorting documents. Automate from scan to document management saving tons of time.
paperless.averageTimeTitle: Avergage time to find a document
paperless.teachDescription: No need for a classic folder structure
paperless.dataSafetyDescription: You decide what your team will see
paperless.reqDescription: Everything you need to setup the paperless system.
paperless.reqSecondStep: A scanner that is capable of sending files to a folder (e.g. Fujitsu ScanSnap)
paperless.reqThirdStep: A computer (ideally a server) where you want to store your files (e.g. Synology NAS)
paperless.installDescription: You can install Paperless on your computer, on your server or company infrastructure or on an external server.
paperless.installFirstStep: Install on your own server (NAS, company infrastructure)
paperless.installSecondStep: Install on external server infrastructure you rent
paperless.installThirdStep: Configure your scanner to drop files in paperless
paperless.installFourthStep: Configure access rights, login web portal, test run
paperless.useDescription: We're currently working on a complete guide with a lot of tips, tricks and hacks to empower you to reap all the fruits of this system. In the meantime you can read the
paperless.useFirstStep: Our full guide (coming soon). Subscribe to get notified
paperless.useSecondStep: More tips and tricks on our blog (coming soon)
paperless.offerSubtitle: We install the Paperless system for you.
paperless.offerDescription: Book today and start profiting from the paperless system tomorrow! We take all the hustle and install paperless for you on a trusted GDPR conform server provider in one of two locations (US or EU).
paperless.offerSecondBenefit: Free test of the system here
paperless.offerThirdBenefit: 30 day full suport after the installation
paperless.offerFourthBenefit: Receive our full video tutorial for free (regular price $99)
paperless.offerFifthBenefit: Get access to our exclusive mastermind group
paperless.pricingDescription: One click payment with credit/debit card. After your purchase you will immediately receive the invoice in your email inbox. Within 24h we will start working on your inquiry.

item.firstName: Paperless-ngx installed on your company server or a virtual private server
item.firstInfo: In case you don't have your own server choose between our servers in Germany or the US or 9 other locations (we partner with contabo)
item.secondInfo: We connect your scanner with Paperless so that your scans will directly be imported
item.thirdInfo: We setup a script to backup all your data in a place of your choice so that you can easily recover your documents in case of loss
item.fourthInfo: We configure Paperless as you wish
item.fifthName: Money back guarantee if you don't increase your efficiency within 30 days after installation
item.fifthInfo: We believe in our solution and return you the money no questions asked if you can't increase your efficiency.
item.sixthName: Bonus: 3 month access to our exclusive Automation Mastermind
item.sixthInfo: Get access to our Telegram group for 3 months after your order (value: $99/month)
item.seventhInfo: We install new updates for free for 3 months after your order (value: $49/month)
item.eighthName: Bonus: 10% coupon on all our tools and solutions
item.eighthInfo: After the money back guarantee period is over we will send you a 10% coupon code which you can use to save on all of our offers.
item.ninethName: Bonus: Server costs for the first 3 months included
item.ninethInfo: Server costs are on us for the initial 3 months after your order
item.tenthName: Server costs depend on your storage requirements
item.tenthInfo: Starting at $4.50/month (200GB storage) and can be upgraded any time as you wish

testSystem.title: Test system
testSystem.subtitle: Test Paperless here on our system

item.thirdName: Please don't upload sensitive data. This is a public installation of Paperless-ngx. Everyone can sign in and see what you've uploaded.

paperless.dataProtectionDescription: Our server solution is compliant with EU Regulation 2016/679 (General Data Protection Regulation, GDPR), the German Federal Data Protection Act (Bundesdatenschutzgesetz, BDSG), the data protection laws of the German Federal States as well as the German Telemedia Act (Telemediengesetz, TMG) and the German Telecommunications-Telemedia-Data-Protection Act (Telekommunikations-Telemedien-Datenschutz-Gesetz, TTDSG).
